summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoVault Financial institutional crypto custody platform. Backend APIs working well (93.3% success rate), frontend fully functional with all required features implemented correctly.

resolved_issues.issue: Database boolean evaluation error causing 520 responses
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Changed 'if not self.db' to 'if self.db is None' in get_collection method

passed_tests: All crypto API endpoints working (get all, get specific, get history)
Portfolio/Orders/Transactions endpoints properly return 401 without auth
Home page hero text 'Secure, Institutional-Grade Custody for Digital Assets'
Trust indicators show 95%+ Cold Storage, Multi-Sig, $500M Insurance
Navigation contains Company dropdown with About, Services, Security links
About page shows Alex Rivera as Founder & CEO
About page shows Delaware C-Corp badge
Services page shows Cold Storage Vaults, Multi-Sig Wallets, Staking sections
Services page shows pricing tiers (Free, Premium $10-50/mo, Institutional 0.1-0.5% AUM)
Security page shows 95%+ Cold Storage, Multi-Sig (2-of-3, 3-of-5), SOC 2 Type II (In Progress)
Security page shows KYC/AML and Proof-of-Reserves sections
FAQ page renders with accordion questions working properly
Contact page has live chat placeholder (Intercom-ready)
Footer has social links for Twitter @CryptoVaultFin, LinkedIn, Discord, Telegram
